name: Tokyo to Singapore by Luxury Ship | Celebrity Royal Suite
description:
Check out Rocket Money for free: https://RocketMoney.com/trektrendy

Today I’m taking the Celebrity Millennium for 4,000 miles from Tokyo, Japan all the way over to Singapore. Taking 14 days, I’ll show you exactly what it’s like from my luxury Royal Suite to the onboard dining as well as a full look at the facilities onboard. As usual this has been fully paid for myself, and there’s a full costing breakdown in the video ($24,256). 

0:00 - Intro
3:19 - Royal Suite
11:25 - Ship tour
18:03 - Retreat Sundeck
21:22 - Hong Kong
23:53 - Dinner
29:20 - The Cost
